items.summary: Create/replace the static branding assets derived from the uploaded logo image (ee.png) and store them under frontend/public/assets/generated using the exact filenames referenced by the app: shq-kepsek-icon.dim_512x512.png (512x512) and shq-kepsek-logo.dim_1024x256.png (1024x256).

Ensure the new logo is displayed consistently (and the old logo is fully replaced) on: (1) the global header (AppHeader), (2) the admin dashboard page, (3) the kepsek dashboard page, and (4) the login page, by relying on centralized branding constants (frontend/src/constants/branding.ts) and removing any remaining hardcoded/legacy logo paths in these screens.
